p:
To evaluate ZIKV transmission by mosquitoes, saliva was collected in individual glass capillary tube containing immersion oil Type B. Salivation was allowed to occur for 25–30 min at room temperature. After salivation, the capillary tube was put into 100 μl of Dulbecco’s Modified Eagle Medium (DMEM) with 10% EquaFETAL (Atlas Biologicals, Fort Collins, CO) and 100 Units/mL of penicillin and 100 μg/mL of streptomycin, and the tube was centrifuged at maximum speed for 5 min. Outbred mice are susceptible to CHIKV infection
43 and were used as host animals in CHIKV transmission experiments based on a previously published protocol
44 . Individual mosquitoes were allowed to feed on 5-day old mice. Mice were euthanized 3 days after exposure to mosquitoes. The front limb was removed from each mouse, homogenized in 500 ul of PBS-G, and tested for CHIKV infection by RT-qPCR.
